sections.title: Details
content: This is a solo musical instrument competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: This competition consists of a single round.
Time Limit: 3 to 4 minutes for the performance.
Participants will have 1 minute for setup before their performance.
The performance can be self-composed or a cover.
Participants may use a backing track or have a single accompanist for support.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: Only students of COEP Technological University are allowed to participate.
Participants must bring their own instruments; basic setup (e.g., mic stands, amplifiers) will be provided.
Pre-recorded loops, software-based assistance, and vulgar or obscene content are strictly prohibited.
Each participant must adhere to the given time limits for setup and performance.
The use of more than one instrument during the performance is allowed but must stay within the time limit.
Accompanist:
Participants may bring one accompanist to support them during their performance.
The accompanist is not judged as part of the competition.
Judges' decisions will be final and binding.

sections.title: Details
content: This is a solo classical singing competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: Round 1 : Elimination Round
Time Limit: 1.5 minutes.
Participants must perform a relevant song in their chosen category without accompaniment or backing tracks.
Top performers from this round qualify for the next round.
Participants can perform original compositions if relevant to their category.
Round 2 : Finals
Finalists must prepare a new song which they haven't sung in the earlier rounds.
The finalists may be asked to sing specific types of songs, scales, etc., by the judges in this round
Time limit: 2.5 minutes to 3.5 minutes.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: This competition is open for only COEP students.
No backing tracks are allowed for eliminations.
Participants can play one instrument OR have an accompanist for a musical instrument OR use a backing track for eliminations and finals.
Vulgarity and obscenity at any point are strictly not allowed.
Each participant can sing in one category per registration and can register for both classical and non classical separately.
Original compositions are allowed and encouraged.
No rap music or remixing is allowed in this competition.
Obscenity of any kind is not allowed and will lead to immediate disqualification.
For the finals, participants have to sing a song which has not been submitted in the prior rounds.
The time limit for all rounds should be strictly followed.

sections.title: Details
content: This is a non-classical singing competition.

Time limit: 2.5 minutes to 3.5 minutes.
